Package http.server

Class WebServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • http.server.WebServer
  • public class WebServer
extends java.lang.Object
    WebServer allowing to use different requests : GET, DELETE, PUT

    • Method Detail

      • start

        protected void start()
        WebServer constructor. Starts the server on the port 3000 Waits for a connection When a client is connected, waits for requests and responds Returns a header with the code 400 Bad Request if the request' syntax is incorrect

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Start the application.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line parameters are not used.

      • isTypeSupported

        public boolean isTypeSupported​(java.lang.String type)
        Method isSupported Tests if a resource type is supported by the server's implemented requests Returns true if the type can be found amongst the supported types in the ArrayList supportedTypes
        Parameters:
        type - the type we want to test
        Returns:
        a boolean telling if the type is supported
